name.value: Visit the Github repository for more information

description.value: A reference to a CTS2 model element. ComponentReference may reference a model attribute, a Property or a special element such as match strength.

definition.value: A reference to a CTS2 model element. ComponentReference may reference a model attribute, a Property or a special element such as match strength.

short.value: a reference to an attribute in a CTS2 model such as formalName, designation, etc

definition.value: a reference to an attribute in a CTS2 model such as formalName, designation, etc.

short.value: a reference to a model Property

definition.value: a reference to a model Property. The reference target carries the URI and, optionally, namespace and name of the property predicate.

short.value: the target of the reference is a special element such as the match strength of a search

definition.value: the target of the reference is a special element such as the match strength of a search
